        {
            "claims": [
                {
                    "claim_id": 1,
                    "claim_text": "kNN-Prompt substantially improves zero-shot performance on a wide range of multiple-choice and classification tasks.",
                    "location": "Abstract",
                    "claim_type": "Main finding",
                    "exact_quote": "kNN-Prompt substantially improves zero-shot performance on a wide range of multiple-choice and classification tasks."
                },
                {
                    "claim_id": 2,
                    "claim_text": "kNN-Prompt enables efficient domain adaptation with no additional training.",
                    "location": "Section 5",
                    "claim_type": "Contribution",
                    "exact_quote": "kNN-Prompt enables efficient domain adaptation with no additional training."
                },
                {
                    "claim_id": 3,
                    "claim_text": "The benefits of kNN-Prompt scale with the size of the retrieval model.",
                    "location": "Section 5",
                    "claim_type": "Contribution",
                    "exact_quote": "The benefits of kNN-Prompt scale with the size of the retrieval model."
                },
                {
                    "claim_id": 4,
                    "claim_text": "kNN-Prompt outperforms Holtzman et al. (2021)'s PMI scoring method alone (LM+PMI) as well as the base kNN-LM method of Khandelwal et al. (2020).",
                    "location": "Section 4",
                    "claim_type": "Main finding",
                    "exact_quote": "kNN-Prompt outperforms Holtzman et al. (2021)'s PMI scoring method alone (LM+PMI) as well as the base kNN-LM method of Khandelwal et al. (2020)."
                },
                {
                    "claim_id": 5,
                    "claim_text": "kNN-Prompt consistently outperforms baselines in few-shot inference.",
                    "location": "Section 4",
                    "claim_type": "Main finding",
                    "exact_quote": "kNN-Prompt consistently outperform baselines in few-shot inference."
                },
                {
                    "claim_id": 6,
                    "claim_text": "kNN-Prompt slightly outperforms domain-adaptive pretraining (DAPT) on customer review (CR) and movie review (MR) datasets.",
                    "location": "Section 5",
                    "claim_type": "Contribution",
                    "exact_quote": "kNN-Prompt slightly outperforms domain-adaptive pretraining (DAPT) on customer review (CR) and movie review (MR) datasets."
                },
                {
                    "claim_id": 7,
                    "claim_text": "Using domain-specific data leads to better performance than using a heterogeneous corpus.",
                    "location": "Section 6",
                    "claim_type": "Contribution",
                    "exact_quote": "Using domain-specific data leads to better performance than using a heterogeneous corpus."
                },
                {
                    "claim_id": 8,
                    "claim_text": "Performance monotonically improves with the number of retrieved neighbors up to 1024.",
                    "location": "Section 6",
                    "claim_type": "Main finding",
                    "exact_quote": "Performance monotonically improves with the number of retrieved neighbors as k is increased to 1024."
                },
                {
                    "claim_id": 9,
                    "claim_text": "The benefits of kNN-Prompt scale with the size of the retrieval model.",
                    "location": "Section 6",
                    "claim_type": "Main finding",
                    "exact_quote": "The benefits of kNN-Prompt scale with the size of the retrieval model."
                },
                {
                    "claim_id": 10,
                    "claim_text": "The effect of PMI scoring is increased when used with fuzzy verbalizers and kNN retrieval.",
                    "location": "Section 6",
                    "claim_type": "Main finding",
                    "exact_quote": "The effect of PMI scoring is increased, however, when we use fuzzy verbalizers and kNN retrieval together."
                },
                {
                    "claim_id": 11,
                    "claim_text": "kNN-Prompt improves the base LM's zero-shot accuracy by 13.4% on average.",
                    "location": "Section 6",
